00029 namespace affxgqc
00030 {
00031 
00032 /*! Used to store information in a GQC file. */
00033 class GQCFileData
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     /*! Constructor */
00037     GQCFileData();
00038     
00039     /*! Destructor */
00040     ~GQCFileData();
00041 
00042     /*! Clear the data. */
00043     void Clear();
00044 
00045     /*! The QC analysis results. */
00046     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList &QCResults() { return qcResults; }
00047 
00048     /*! The sample signature */
00049     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList &SampleSignature() { return sampleSignature; }
00050 
00051     /*! The analysis parameters */
00052     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList &AnalysisParameters() { return analysisParameters; }
00053 
00054         /*! Reads the entire contents of the file.
00055          * @param fileName The name of the file to read.
00056      * @return true if successful
00057          */
00058         bool Read(const std::string &fileName);
00059 
00060         /*! Write the data to the file.
00061          * @param fileName The name of the file to read.
00062      * @return true if successful
00063          */
00064         bool Write(const std::string &fileName);
00065 
00066 private:
00067     /*! The QC analysis results. */
00068     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList qcResults;
00069 
00070     /*! The sample signature */
00071     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList sampleSignature;
00072 
00073     /*! The analysis parameters */
00074     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList analysisParameters;
00075 
00076 };
00077 
00078 };
